sqlMap.select: SELECT Z.BrandCode AS BrandCode, X.CounterCode AS CounterCode, X.CounterNameIF AS CounterName, X.CounterKind AS counterKind, X.[PassWord] AS PassWord, X.CounterAddress AS CounterAddress, X.CounterTelephone AS CounterTelephone, X.CounterSynergyFlag AS CounterSynergyFlag, X.ValidFlag AS ValidFlag, R.RegionCode AS RegionCode, CC.RegionCode AS Citycode, N.ResellerCode AS AgentCode, N.ResellerName AS AgentName, convert(varchar(30),O.ExpiringDate,120) AS ExpiringDate, L.ChannelName AS Channel, R.RegionNameChinese AS RegionName, CC.RegionNameChinese AS CityName FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo X JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization O ON (O.BIN_OrganizationID = X.BIN_OrganizationID ) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region R ON (O.BIN_RegionID = R.BIN_RegionID AND R.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region CC ON (O.BIN_CityID = CC.BIN_RegionID AND CC.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo Z ON (X.BIN_BrandInfoID = Z.BIN_BrandInfoID AND Z.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel L ON (X.BIN_ChannelID = L.BIN_ChannelID AND L.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ResellerInfo N ON (X.BIN_ResellerInfoID = N.BIN_ResellerInfoID AND N.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE X.BIN_CounterInfoID = #counterInfoId#
